_sText:
Fun map with boats.
Each team has 8 boats, each boat must be controled by 2 players. One player drives the boat, the other controls the canon.
16 CT vs 16 T
Kill enemies destroying their boats, or using knifes.
To destroy a boat you need to hit it 3 times, when boat is destroyed all on it will die.

--Changelog--

--V1--
-First Version

--V2--
-Increased maxplayers to 32
-Increased boats to 16
-New canon structure, easier to enter.
-Increased boat resistance.
-Added explosions on boats.
-Removed timelimit.
-Removed hurt on sea.
-Added 3D Skybox

--V3--
-New map environment, harbors instead beach
-Compiled with RAD, added HDR
-Hurt on sea has been added again
-Now AFKs will fall to sea and die after 90 seconds
-Boats move faster
-Canons move faster
-Added cameras on boats and canons to improve driver vision
-Added instrucions when player enter in the boat or canon
